sentences.en: Before you scold me for being uncooperative, ask yourself if something might be bothering me.
sentences.cn: 当你想责骂我不合作、固执或懒惰前, 请你想想,是否有什么困扰着我?

sentences.en: Before you scold me for being uncooperative, please ask yourself if something might be bothering me.
sentences.cn: 当你因为责骂我的不合作、固执或懒惰之前, 请你想想,是否有什麽正在困扰者我.

sentences.en: In the passive location system based on the FM broadcast, signals are uncooperative and non - stationary.
sentences.cn: 基于调频广播的无源定位系统中, 其信号是非合作的 非 平稳信号.

sentences.en: It won't work with that uncooperative attitude.
sentences.cn: 对于不合作的人,这是无效的.

sentences.en: It would not facilitate matters if you were uncooperative.
sentences.cn: 如果你不合作,事情就不好办了.

sentences.en: She became uncooperative: unwilling to do her homework or help with any household chores.
sentences.cn: 她变得很不合作：不愿做作业，也不愿帮着做家务。

sentences.en: That supervisor is so uncooperative, he gets right up my nose.
sentences.cn: 那位主管很不好相处, 他使我觉得讨厌.

sentences.en: The captain is not only insulting but uncooperative.
sentences.cn: 船长不仅无礼而且不合作.

sentences.en: The mining unions are probably the most uncooperative of all.
sentences.cn: 矿业公会可能是最不合作的.

sentences.en: Their uncooperative attitude caused the rent of the treaty.
sentences.cn: 他们不合作的态度破坏了合约.

sentences.en: They became bossy , uncooperative and hostile in their efforts to ward off depression.
sentences.cn: 为了避免陷入沮丧,他们变得盛气凌人 、 不肯合作、情绪敌对.

sentences.en: This attitude, over the long haul , will develop very resentful and uncooperative family members.
sentences.cn: 这种态度, 日积月累, 在家人之间就会发展为抱怨和不和.

sentences.en: What is it about this outfit that is making everyone so uncooperative?
sentences.cn: 为什么这身打扮让每个人都那么不合作 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 不愿合作的，不愿配合的
trans.tran_en: not willing to work with or help someone
